trans-unit.source: Provides UI support for working with extender controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 提供在設計階段使用含有擴充項控制項的 UI 支援。

trans-unit.source: The ExtenderControlDesigner class enables you to interact with extender controls on the page at design time in an IDE such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: ExtenderControlDesigner 類別可讓您互動之頁面上的擴充項控制項在設計階段於 IDE 例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Only control developers and IDE developers have to interact with this class directly.
trans-unit.target: 只有控制項開發人員和 IDE 的開發人員必須直接互動與這個類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ExtenderControlDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ExtenderControlDesigner"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ExtenderControlDesigner"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ExtenderControlDesigner"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this [{1}](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數是`true`，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個[{1}](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)參考。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the standard HTML rendering of an extender control at design time, which includes type and ID information.
trans-unit.target: 取得在設計階段，其中包含類型和識別碼資訊的擴充項控制項標準 HTML 轉譯。

trans-unit.source: The design-time HTML rendering of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的設計階段 HTML 轉譯。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified component and adds it to the component change service.
trans-unit.target: 初始化指定的元件，並將它加入至元件變更服務。

trans-unit.source: A component of type <xref href="System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl"></xref> that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> interface.
Adjusts the items listed in the properties grid for the control.
trans-unit.target: 調整控制項的屬性方格中列出的項目。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary that contains the properties for the control.
trans-unit.target: 字典，包含控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current control is displayed on the design surface so it can be selected and its properties can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否目前顯示控制項的設計介面上，也可以選取和編輯其屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current control is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果會顯示目前的控制項。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
